'''''The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack - Special Edition''''' is a special edition album comprising of the soundtrack from ''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies]]'', by [[Howard Shore]]. It was released digitally and on CD on [[9 December]] [[2014]].
